attributes.action: Britian is becoming a Anti-Christian Country!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Christians are facing serious persecution over their religious views.

The church is trying to change its moral views on marriage. And this has to stop. As the Holy Bible teaches about homosexuality in chapter Romans in the News Test.

Recently in the news christians have been targeted and may even lose their jobs.

What is going on? Somebody has to speak out about this moral decline.

rejection.details: Church policy is not something the PM has any control of. Your concerns should be sent to the relevant authorities.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
